review: I'm actually surprised at how much I like this. Two things really stand out:1. It's FAST. The one-time setup is fast enough, but then once it's up the speed of selection is amazing. You find what you want and, bam, you're watching it. Really impressive speed.2. It's easy and intuitive. There are hardly any instructions that come with it, but guess what: you don't need them. Plug it in, follow a couple of instructions, and before you even realize it you're in full control.It's got all the features described and expected, but a few others are nice too. One in particular is the Prime Music integration. If you have Prime then you can use Prime Music, and if you run Prime Music through Fire TV (which, again, is really fast and easy) then it will not only play the songs but also scroll the lyrics on your TV in real time. Cool little features like that are found throughout.
